primarySegments.name: Young Urban Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy individuals living in urban areas who value safety and quick access to emergency services.

problemsNeeds: Need quick access to emergency services
Concerned about personal safety in urban environments
behaviors: Likely to download and test new apps
Use the app in high-risk areas
Share app with friends and family

primarySegments.name: Elderly and Caregivers
primarySegments.description: Older adults and their caregivers who prioritize health and safety, especially in emergency situations.

problemsNeeds: Fear of being unable to call for help
behaviors: Caregivers download the app for their charges
Use the app as a safety net
Engage with customer support for setup assistance

primarySegments.name: Parents of Young Children
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about the safety of their children and need a reliable way to ensure their family's safety in emergencies.

problemsNeeds: Desire for quick communication in emergencies
Concerned about potential threats to family safety
behaviors: Install the app on all family members' devices
Recommend the app to other parents
